name: refreshAccounts

testSteps.description: Given that I'm logged into 'Account Recon' page

children.description: When i open page from sidebar menu: {Account Recon}

testSteps.description: Then the 'Account Recon' page and its contents should show up
Then the 'Refresh' button should be disabled
Then the 'Refresh' button should be enabled
Then the 'Recon Type' should be 'Bank Reconciliation'
Then the 'Ledger Type' should be 'Foreign Currency (CA)'
When I set 'Ledger Type' to 'Base Currency (AA)'

exception.message:
